item.title: Farah add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Farah add a quote by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "The game is afoot." -- Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Farah add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "My name is Sherlock Holmes. It is my business to know what other people do not know." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "In this world, all--men, women, and kings--must live for the present. We can only live for the future for God" -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "There are misfortunes in life that no one will accept; people would rather believe in the supernatural and the impossible." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "Forward! Still forward!" said he. "When it shall be time, God will tell me, as he has told the others." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "No. I will remain because I have been accustomed for thirty years to go and take the orderly word of the King, and to have it said to me, 'Good evening, d'Artagnan,' with a smile I did not beg for!" -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "I am orderly out of spirit of idleness, to save myself the trouble of looking after things..." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "I have always heard it said that that is the rarest service, but the easiest to render. The remark struck me; I like to cite remarks that strike me." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "What the deuce does the fellow mean by getting trap-doors made without first consulting you? Trap-doors!" -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "It is feared that it may be the smallpox, sir," replied Porthos... "and what is serious is that it will certainly spoil his face." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "Within six months, if I am not dead, I shall have seen you again, madam--even if I have to overturn the world." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "All falsehood is a mask; and however well made the mask may be, with a little attention we may always succeed in distinguishing it from the true face." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "People in general," he said, "only ask advice not to follow it; or if they do follow it, it is for the sake of having someone to blame for having given it." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Farah add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Wraiths! Wraiths on wings!" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Farah add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Farah add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "It is useless for me to describe to you how terrible Violet, Klaus, and even Sunny felt in the time that followed. If you have ever lost someone very important to you, then you already know how it feels, and if you haven't, you cannot possibly imagine it." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Farah add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To lose one parent may be regarded as a misfortune; to lose both looks like carelessness." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Farah add a quote by Baroness Emmuska Orczy
item.description: "They seek him here, they seek him there Those Frenchies seek him everywhere Is he in heaven or is he in hell? That demned elusive Pimpernel" -- Baroness Emmuska Orczy

item.title: Farah add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Sleeping on a dragon's hoard with greedy, dragonish thoughts in his heart, he had become a dragon himself." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Farah add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I have come home at last! This is my real country! I belong here. This is the land I have been looking for all my life, though I never knew it till now...Come further up, come further in!" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Farah add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The term is over: the holidays have begun. The dream is ended: this is the morning." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Farah add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Do not dare not to dare." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Farah add a quote by Uncle Remus
item.description: "Brer Rabbit had to get even with Brer Turtle. But as hard as he thought, as long as he thought, as wide and high as he thought, he didn't have a thought." -- Uncle Remus

item.title: Farah add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Farah add a quote by Ratty (Wind in the Willows)
item.description: "There is nothing, absolutely nothing so much worth doing as messing around in boats." -- Ratty (Wind in the Willows)

item.title: Farah add a quote by Kate DiCamillo
item.description: "There is nothing sweeter in this sad world than the sound of someone you love calling your name." -- Kate DiCamillo

item.title: Farah add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Farah add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description:
"Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'
I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Farah add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description:
"The rule is, jam tomorrow and jam yesterday-but never jam today
It must come sometime to jam today, Alice objected
No it can't said the Queen It's jame every other day. Today isn't any other day, you know" -- Lewis Carroll
